text: Sivers may refer to: ==People== * Derek Sivers (b. 1969), American entrepreneur * Fanny de Sivers (1920 – 2011), Estonian linguist * Malou von Sivers (b. 1953), Swedish journalist * Marie Steiner-von Sivers (1867 – 1948), Polish Anthroposophist * Rudolf Sivers (1892 – 1918), Russian revolutionary ==Places== * Lake Sivers, a lake in Latvia == See also == * Sievers
title: Sivers
